newsitem.title: USA: U.S.-SDR rate opener, weekly charge rates.
newsitem.headline: U.S.-SDR rate opener, weekly charge rates.

text.p: The International Monetary Fund said the opening exchange value of the U.S. dollar against the SDR was 1.36752, versus 1.37018 yesterday.

The IMF said that for the week beginning April 21, the rate of interest and charges on the SDR is 4.05 percent. The rate of remuneration on members' creditor positions is also 4.05 percent. The rate of charge on members' use of fund credit is 4.43 percent.
